abstract: Directors Chris Milk and Spike Jonze, in partnership with Vice News, produce eight-minute virtual-reality experience that puts audiences into Millions March protest in New York in December; Milk has several virtual-reality projects.
lead_paragraph: The directors Chris Milk and Spike Jonze, in partnership with Vice News, have created an eight-minute virtual-reality experience that catapults audiences into the center of the Millions March protest in New York in December.
snippet: The directors Chris Milk and Spike Jonze, in partnership with Vice News, have created an eight-minute virtual-reality experience that catapults audiences into the center of the Millions March protest in New York in December.

headline.main: Vice Uses Virtual Reality to Immerse Viewers in News
headline.print_headline: Vice Uses Virtual Reality to Immerse Viewers in News
